channel.title: Black mesa in SDK(hammer)
channel.description:
does anyone have a FGD/ a bunch of usefull stuff for hammer that i can use to experiment and make maps?
im going to make a few posters too :slight_smile:
i want to try to make a simple dm map for BMDM(even if the game doesnt support multiplayer yet)
its good to get used to the enteties and stuff before the real mapping begin :wink:
sorry if im double posting... i didnt see my first thread :meh:
hope someone can help me with this :freeman:

item.title: Black mesa in SDK(hammer)

item.description:
i had some issues but i think this is how … its working for me sofar but im still not sure https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13968

item.title: Black mesa in SDK(hammer)
item.dc:creator: mr.Hazard
item.description:
do you have some kind of config and stuff that you can give me? i saw the three FGD’s in the BMS folder,but im unable to configure hammer for BMS…

i know that i have to use sdk base 2007,but the enteties wont show up in the editor…

ive loaded every single fgd in the BMS folder.

why did it take so long for this to get posted?(talking about the thread)

Read full topic

item.description:

They already released the fdgs. They should be in the mod folder.

Thanks Stiffy!!
